The cell organises various placement activities to help students prepare for the final rounds of the IIT Mandi placement process. The top recruiters will participate in the IIT Mandi placement drive programme.

description: Established in 1920, Jamia Millia Islamia is a central university which is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC). Based on the results of the entrance exam, the university will create a merit list, which will be followed by the counselling process. Shortlisted candidates must then appear and qualify for the interview. Jamia Millia Islamia (JMI) has a placement cell that welcomes all organisations to pre-placement talks and provides personality development programmes, workshops, and other assistance to the students. The university offers public and private scholarships to the JMI New Delhi students.

name: Siksha `O` Anusandhan
latest_news_and_events: 1) Dr. Kulamani Parida (Professor in Chemistry and Director, Siksha ‘O’ Anusandhan (Deemed-to-be University)) was awarded the Careers360 Faculty Research Award in the Materials Science domain. He has 506 publications, 17637 citations and his H-index is 85. 2) Dr. Amit Kumar Nayak (Professor in the Department of Pharmaceutics, School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Siksha ‘O’ Anusandhan (Deemed-to-be University) was also awarded the Careers360 Faculty Research Award in the Dentistry domain. Dr Nayak has 287 publications, 3481 citations and his H-index is 58.
description: Established in 2007, Siksha 'O' Anusandhan (SOA), Bhubaneswar is a private  Deemed-to-be University. The university is spread over 452 acres of land. Siksha ‘O’ Anusandhan is accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with Grade A++ and the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). The university is also recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC). In the NIRF 2023 Ranking, it has been ranked 9th in the dental category, 16th rank in the medical category, 15th rank in the university category, 27th rank in the engineering category, 8th rank in the law category, 26th in the overall category and 57th in the management category. SOA University offers courses at the undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral levels in multiple specialisations. Siksha 'O' Anusandhan courses are offered in engineering, management, pharmacy and many more streams. SOA University admission to the courses will be done on the basis of the marks scored in the national-level entrance examination scores or university-level examination. Candidates qualifying the Siksha O Anusandhan University Admission Test (SAAT) are enrolled on various UG and PG courses offered by Siksha 'O' Anusandhan University. SOA provides a series of financial aid and scholarship opportunities to meritorious students. According to the SOA University placements 2022 (available on the official website), 164 recruiters participated in the placement process whereas, the highest package stood at Rs. 42 LPA. The major recruiters of SOA University are Adobe, Accenture, Adani, Amazon, Aditya Birla, Berger, Bosch, Capgemini, Cognizant, Dell, Deloitte, Ericsson, HCL, ICICI Bank, KPMG, Oracle and many others.
exam: NEET, GATE, NEET PG, JEE Main, NEET MDS, CAT, MAT, CLAT, XAT, NEET SS, GPAT, SAAT

Admission at KIIT University to all the courses (except MBBS, BDS, PG Medical & PG Dental) is done through the Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology Entrance Examination (KIITEE). Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology was ranked 16th among Indian Universities by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF).
